Question: As the wife of President Bill ****, she was also the First Lady of the United States from 1993 to 2001.
Hints: In anticipation of high sales, publisher Simon & Schuster paid this person a near-record advance of $8 million.
Books praising this person did not sell nearly as well (other than the memoirs written by her and her husband).
This person gave Congressional testimony on the Benghazi attack on January 23, 2013.
